## Requirements
- [ ] My website is completed and reachable.
- [ ] The CNAME record does not contain `https://` or `/`.
- [ ] The `owner` field contains valid and sufficient information.
- [ ] I understand that if an NS record is provided, no other record types (A, CNAME, TXT, etc.) can be included for the same subdomain.
- [ ] I have placed the JSON file in the `domains/` folder with the correct filename.
- [ ] I fully accept and understand the [Terms of Service](https://github.com/hungrerovn/domain-register/blob/main/terms.md) of this project.
- [ ] I understand that if these requirements are not met, my pull request will be closed.
